summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to 2000 Conservation Futures Levy proceeds allocated to The City of Seattle for the acquisition of property located at 10 Broad Street; authorizing the Mayor to amend the Interlocal Cooperation Agreement between The City of Seattle and King County authorized by Ordinance 114978; authorizing deposit of Conservation Futures Levy proceeds received from King County in the Conservation Futures Fund; making an appropriation from the Conservation Futures Fund; and reimbursing the Cumulative Reserve Subfund Unrestricted Subaccount.
